New Records: Brandon King and Evin Lewis scored 107 off just 55 balls, the fastest partnership of 107 in T20Is for West Indies
Key Match Events: Kamindu Mendis and Charith Asalanka hit their respective fifties for Sri Lanka
Brandon King and Evin Lewis shaped a perfect chase for West Indies
Post-Match Reflections: West Indies took a 1-0 lead in the three-match series against Sri Lanka
Miscellaneous Highlights: The second T20I will be held on Tuesday, October 15, at the same venue in Dambulla
